TkCoo Class Reference

Class that hold the routines to get local and global Coordiantes for the tracker strips. More...

#include <TkCoo.h>

List of all members.

Static Public Member Functions

int GetMaxMult (int tkid, int readchann)
 Returns the max Coo multiplicity due to K side ambiguity. A tkid and a readout channel number must be provided. The answer for and S-side readout channel is always 1.
int GetMaxMult (int tkid, float readchann)

Detailed Description

Class that hold the routines to get local and global Coordiantes for the tracker strips.

Date:
2008/03/18 PZ First version

2008/04/02 SH Some bugs are fixed

2008/04/18 SH Updated for alignment study

2008/04/21 AO Ladder local coordinate

float TkCoo::GetLocalCoo (  int  tkid,
int  readchann,
int  mult
)  [static]
 

Returns the local coordinate corresponding on the readout channel.

Parameters:
readchann on the ladder indicated by
tkid. The third field correspond to the requested multiplicity ( 0 to GetMaxMult(tkid,readchann)-1 ). If mult is > GetMaxMult(tkid,readchann)-1 the returned coordinate correspont to mult= GetMaxMult(tkid,readchann)-1

int TkCoo::GetMaxMult (  int  tkid,
int  readchann
)  [inline, static]
 

Returns the max Coo multiplicity due to K side ambiguity. A tkid and a readout channel number must be provided. The answer for and S-side readout channel is always 1.
